comments.comment:
Now UNP got a second chance on 16 Dec. 18, following the
decision by the Supreme Court, and must carry out their promises made in 2015,
prior to the general elections, otherwise UNP will be wiped off the at the next
general election. Sri Lanka cannot carry on by raising taxes on consumer goods,
even at this late stage government must introduce a system where all lawyers,
doctors, businesses and politicians must be compelled to pay their taxes.
Please do not think today people are dummies and will surprise the politicians at
the next election who still think that we are dummies. This beautiful country
has been robbed by all politicians during the last 50 years.
comments.author: Hugh

comments.comment: Mulinma kiyanne obata jaya mage ratata jaya!.janapethi samanalaya keewa obata , but ohu rate janathawata sewaya karanna sudussek neme hewwe, ohu hewwe ohuta kasaadekata kenek, balanakota ohui lankawe lokuma samanalayaaaa üòÜüòÖ, aduma gane kathawakwath pawathwanna janadipethi danne na. Mokada minissungen banumma ahala oluwa narakwela. Horu paathaalayo marayo kudu allas siyallomawa beranna unta pakshapaathawenna gihin me manussaya banum ahapunathi kenek nathi tharam, gedara minissu witharak neme gedara ballath uge makkath banina thanata m3 watuna. Hamoma janapathi kiyannath akamathi, dan hamoma m3 kiyanne. Ohuta kisiwek garu karanna akamathi ohuge neecha kriya nisa. Ada ohuta neethiya yatakaraganna bari welaa thiyenne 100 gaththoth 80 inne duppath janathawa owun inne unp samagai. Neethiya mulinma balanne wadi pirisa onema moodayekuta unath penawa m3 sapata kakaa inna balukukkek bawa. Mokada duppath janathawata monawada thiyana prasna kanna thiyanawada  badumila keeyada e mokuth katha nokara loku lokko ekathu karagana eka eka sammanthrana pwathwamin sathutuwemin kaatahari banimin pissek wage kaalaya kaa damanawa, kisideyak rate nowna gaanata innawa ane mehemath pissek üò£.eka ekkena awilla minissunwa rawattana eka karanne daruwo wadagannawa  camerawa allalaa loketa pennala  darwekuta dena kiri  packet eke gaana ahasa usata asarana daruwekuta kirithe tikakwath denna widihak na daruwo udeta adanawa , ewnata m3 uta beeganna kaaganna baritharam uge gedara kaama purawala ekai m3 ta duppathaage duka nodanenne. Marayan duushithayan thora apita yahapaalanayak awashyai. Eyata obathuma ho pakshyen monama paarshikayek idiripath unath janathawa baara gannawa. Obata mata mage ahinsaka asarana duppath janathawata jayawewa budusaranai dewipihitai jesu pihitai sobhadharmayama aaraksha karathwaaa!!!.üòöüòôüòöüòöüòö

comments.comment: Dear Honorable Prime Minister Mr. Ranil Wickramasingha ,  It was a super excellent speech. Thank you. You addressed the right point with proper target.This is one of the best speech you delivered within this crisis time period. Now we are living in 21st century. Over 60 years of life experience , kinder garden to university level of 30 plus years of education , 40 years plus political experience and activities and international level of respect you have earned and accomplished  by you Mr, Prime Minister. We saw your political maturity and your educated mentality which is going with 21st century. We respect to you  from our heart , You have won the heart and mind of the international community as well as  majority of the Sri Lankan who can think as open minded citizen of Sri lanka. We too respect and honor to your  sacrifice for our motherland. We are very confident that you can do the best to SriLanka better than  anybody else in this situation. May God Bless You always!
comments.author: Nihal Piumpathy

replies.replyComment: Absolutely My Friend , Pray for the Safety of Hon.Ranil and Family.üôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôè.
